root.name: Bill Walsh College Football
root.description: Critical ReceptionElectronic Gaming Monthly's Mike Weigand gave the review score of 7 out of ten writing, "...the idea of making this with college football teams is almost irrelevant, since it is almost identical to all other football games out there". Later in the two sentence review he appears to contradict himself when he adds, "...game play is solid, just as you would expect from EA, making it a must for football fans".

similar_games.game: NFL Sports Talk Football '93 Starring Joe Montana
Bulls vs. Lakers and the NBA Playoffs
